amendment.description: To subpoena certain relevant witnesses and documents.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1295 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 28.
Amendment SA 1295 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S767; text: CR S769-771) To subpoena certain relevant witnesses and documents.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1295 proposed by Senator Schumer.
